title: Half-Life (Hard, No Scripts) [34:26] (RTA)
description: This is not Single Segment. I used a save and reload trick for the Lambda Core Elevator. Not exactly the best run ever, only beating the record by 3 seconds isn't what I wanted. WR I beat: [http://www.twitch.tv/kukkye/c/4093467](http://www.twitch.tv/kukkye/c/4093467)
